activities.loc: Branch 2 Courtroom, 2nd Floor, Oneida County Courthouse

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

2:37 PM Defendant Kelli L St Germaine appeared by video. Attorney Anne M. Katte in court for Kelli L St Germaine. Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Calling 21CF323, 21CF349, 22CF1 & 22CM39. In receipt of complaint, waive reading - not guilty plea in 22CM39. All cases to be set for pre-trial. Bail continued. Defendant to appear in person at next hearing. adj. 02:39 PM
Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 6, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

3:48 PM Defendant Kelli L St Germaine in court.  Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Calling 21CF323, 21CF349, 22CF1 and 22CM39. Court review of case. 22CM39 set for an adjourned initial appearance. Defendant states spoke to PD - defendant to contact PD's office again to get appointment. Bond continued. adj. 03:50 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

2:13 PM Defendant Kelli L St Germaine appeared by video, in custody. Attorney Jillian Pfeifer in court for State of Wisconsin. Calling 22CM39, 21CF323, 21CF349 & 22CF1. 22CM39 set for an initial appearance.  Schiek/Defendant statement to counsel. Schiek states was sentenced in Vilas County last week. In receipt of complaint, right to counsel. Schiek statement to bail. Court sets bond 22CM39 and reinstates other bonds.. adj. 02:18 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

10:02 AM Prosecuting attorney Jillian Pfeifer appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Kelli L St Germaine appeared by video, in custody, Attorney Anne M. Katte appeared in court for Kelli L St Germaine. Calling 21CF323, 21CF349 & 22CF1. Katte receipt of complaint, waive reading - waives preliminary hearing. Defendant waives preliminary hearing. Waiver free and voluntary. Court finds that probable cause exists and binds over. Pfeifer states Information will be filed that mirrors Complaint. Katte willing to proceed to Arraignment today; waives further reading and enters not guilty pleas. Defendant sent letters to court concerning bond. Katte/Pfeifer statement to bond. Court questions where Defendant would be living if released. Defendant states would like with father/not employed/has 4 children - lives with father in Minnesota. Court lowers cash bond in 21CF323 & 21CF349 to $250 (in each case) - same conditions. adj.10:10 AM
Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

3:16 PM Prosecuting attorney Jillian Pfeifer appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Kelli L St Germaine appeared by video, in custody. Calling 21CF323, 21CF349 & 22CF1. Attorney Anne Katte has been appointed. Court to set out for PH/AIA. Defendant states sent letter for a bond reduction. Pfeifer would like Katte present - received another referral. Bond continued. adj. 03:19 PM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 20, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Not to go onto any Dollar General premises

2:16 PM Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Kelli L St Germaine appeared by video, in custody. In receipt of complaint, right to counsel. Schiek statement to bail. Defendant states she has active warrants in Vilas County. Defendant not able to get in contact with attorney Anne Katte. Court sets bond. adj. 02:20 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for January 10, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
